info.title: Insights Approval Service API
info.description: The API to create and query approval requests

200.description: Returned objects found by GraphQL query

get.description: Find an action by its id, available to everyone

post.summary: Create an action under the request
post.description: Create an action under a request identified by its id. Admin can create approve, deny, memo, and cancel operations; approver can create approve, deny, and memo operations; while requester can create only cancel operation.

requestBody.description: Action object that needs to be added

get.summary: List all actions of a request
get.description: Find actions of a request identified by its id, available to everyone

get.summary: List filtered requests, available to everyone
get.description: The result depends on the x-rh-persona header (approval/admin, approval/requseter, or approval/approver). Program generated child requests are not included.

post.description: Create an approval request using given parameters, available to everyone

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to create a request

get.description: Find an approval request by its id, available to anyone who can access the request

get.summary: List filtered child requests of a request
get.description: Find child requests based on the parent request id. The result depends on the x-rh-persona header (approval/admin, approval/requseter, or approval/approver).

get.summary: Return the request content of a request
get.description: Find the request content based on a request id, available to everyone
Find all templates, available to admin only
Find a template by its id, available to admin only

Find approval workflows matching search parameters, available to admin only. Optionally select workflows linked to a resource object whose app_name, object_type and object_id are specified by query parameters. Default sorting is by sequence number in ascending order.

get.summary: List all workflows belonging to a template
get.description: Find workflows based on the template id, available to admin only

post.summary: Create a workflow from a template
post.description: Create a workflow from a template identified by its id, available to admin only

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to create a workflow

get.description: Find an approval workflow by its id, available to admin only

patch.description: Find an approval workflow by its id and update its content, available to admin only

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to update an approval workflow

delete.description: Delete an approval workflow by its id, available to admin only

post.summary: Create a resource link to a workflow
post.description: Link a resource object to a workflow identified by its id, available to admin only

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to create a link

post.summary: Break the link between a resource object and a workflow
post.description: Break the link between a resource object selected by the body and a workflow by its id, available to admin only

requestBody.description: Parameters needed to select a resource object

limit.name: limit

persona.name: x-rh-persona
persona.description: Desired persona of the current login user

Basic_auth.description: The userid/password is needed when accessing this API externally

operationName.title: Operation name
operationName.description: If the query contains several named operations, the operationName controls which one should be executed

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: Errors resulting from the GraphQL query

Action.description: An action that changes the state of a request

created_at.title: Created time
created_at.description: Time when the action was created

request_id.title: Request ID
request_id.description: ID of the request that the action belongs to

processed_by.title: Processed by
processed_by.description: The person who performs the action

operation.title: Operation
operation.description: Action type, must be one of the predefined values. The request state will be updated according to the operation.

comments.title: Comments
comments.example: Cannot approve the request due to lacking of resources

app_name.title: App name
app_name.description: Name of the application that the object belongs to

RequestIn.description: Input parameters for approval request object

name.title: Request name
name.description: Name of the the request to be created

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe the request in more details
description.example: Order a higher end VM for production

content.title: Content
content.description: Content of the request in JSON format

tag_resources.title: Request tags
tag_resources.description: An array of resource tags that determine the workflows for the request

app_name.title: App name
app_name.description: Name of the app that the resource belongs to

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: An array of tags that the resource is tagged with

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: The string representation of the tag

Request.description: Approval request. It may have child requests. Only a leaf node request can have workflow_id

state.title: State
state.description: The state of the request, must be one of the predefined values

decision.title: Decision
decision.description: Approval decision, must be one of the predefined values

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Optional reason for the decision, present normally when the decision is denied
reason.example: Reject the request because the inventory is low

workflow_id.title: Workflow ID
workflow_id.description: ID of the workflow that the request belongs to. Present only if the request is a leaf node

created_at.title: Created Time
created_at.description: Time when the request was created

notified_at.title: Notified time
notified_at.description: Time when a notification was sent to approvers

finished_at.title: Finished time
finished_at.description: Time when the request was finished (skipped, canceled, or completed)

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: Identification of whom made the request

name.title: Request name
name.description: Name of the request to be created

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe the request in more details
description.example: Order a higher end VM for production

group_name.title: Approver group(s)
group_name.description: Name of approver group(s) assigned to approve this request

parent_id.title: Parent ID
parent_id.description: ID of the parent group if present

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe the template with more details

Workflow.description: The workflow to process approval requests. Each workflow is linked to multiple groups of approvals.

template_id.title: Template ID
template_id.description: ID of the template that the workflow belongs to

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe the workflow in more details
description.example: A approval process requires ID department to approve

sequence.title: Sequence
sequence.description: an indicator of the execution order for selected workflows

group_refs.title: Approval groups
group_refs.description: Array of RBAC groups associated with workflow. The groups need to have approval permission

GroupRef.description: Group reference describing a RBAC group name and ID

first.title: First Link
first.description: The link to fetch the first group of items in the result set

last.title: Last Link

prev.title: Previous Link

next.title: Next Link
